Projects

SmartBrain App

SmartBrain App detects and marks a person's face in the picture. User must log in or create account in app. After registration can upload photos on the app (from local or by https links) and detect all faces.

Features: User local storage, sensitive data are secured, responsive App, registration form with verification, guess account, detection counter, registration and Sign in forms connected with database. Npm - background,

Technologies: React, JS, CSS, Express JS, Node JS, npm JS, Clarifai REST API, POSTMAN, postgres Sql.

See Live Source Code

RoboFriend App

RoboFriends App fetches users from a JSON test server, creates and displays user cards and generates a picture for each user.

Features: user search box, catching errors (during fetch), scrolling navbar.

Technologies: React, JS, npm, tachyons, css.

REACT version

See Live Source Code

REACT REDUX version

See Live Source Code

Background Generator

User can set up a background gradients in real time and display them with RGB code.

Methods: addEventListener, getElementById, querySelector, linear-gradient.

Technologies: HTML, JS, css.

See Live Source Code

Meblorz Mateusz Website

The website presents services provided by Meblorz Mateusz, shows his realizations at the gallery and links users with Mateusz's social media.

Features: contact form with attachments, interactive navbar.

Technologies: HTML, JS, css.
